page.title: 13HOME LIFE IN BULKINGTON
page.content: Home life in Bulkington features many aspects associated with the country- side, where we are made more aware of the changing seasons. There is an abundance of home-grown vegetables; wines and preserves are made from the produce of hedgerows and gardens. Most wives work in the home, some helping with the family business. Many drive cars, doing the family shopping once a week. Some meet regularly at village groups, or follow activities elsewhere - evening classes,keep-fit, badminton, swimming. Our children enjoy the freedom of living in the country; keep the more usual pets and productive ones like sheep, goats, chickens and ducks. In most cases, travel to the town is an essential part of our lives, but for many, to return home to the country is something we would not change for anything.
